title: Draft Letter of Intent (LOI) for Commercial Lease
description: A business client wants to make an initial offer to lease a retail space. The agent needs to draft an LOI.

tasks.description: Gather the key terms for the LOI from the client (e.g., lease term, rental rate, tenant improvement allowance).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent documents all essential business terms for the proposed lease.

tasks.description: Use a standard LOI template to draft the document with the client's proposed terms.
tasks.expected_outcome: A non-binding Letter of Intent is accurately drafted.

tasks.description: Send the draft LOI to the client for review and approval before sending to the landlord's agent.
tasks.expected_outcome: The draft is sent to the client for final review.
